{{Character | character name = Lydia | image = Lydia.png | ep = [[The One With The Birth]] | number = 1 | actor = [[Leah Remini]] | name = Lydia | gender = Female | relatives = Unnamed mother
Unnamed daughter | relationships = [[Roy]] (boyfriend) }} '''Lydia''' is a woman giving birth in "[[The One With The Birth]]". She was portrayed by [[Leah Remini]]. Lydia gives birth to a daughter. [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] stays with her while she is giving birth, taking the place of the father ([[Roy]]), who was not there, but came later. She is a fan of the basketball team Boston Celtics, while Joey likes the New York Knicks, causing a friendly argument between the two. [[File:Lydia and Roy.jpg|thumb|left|Lydia and [[Roy]] after the birth of their daughter.]] [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:One Appearance Only]] [[Category:Season 1 Characters]] [[Category:Mothers]] [[Category:Characters]]
